page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT IN WALSALL
page.content: Walsall has it's own football ground (the Saddler's), Rugby and Cricket grounds and a recently established American Football team. These are quite well supported by the people of Walsall. There are also facilities in the town for Swimming and Golf. A number of the town's schools are Community schools and open up their sporting facilities to the people of Walsall. Walsall has a network of canals running through the town and many anglers take full advantage of these. They are also popular for canoeing and boating. Walsall has a cinema with three different screens and it has the Grange Theatre. Musical recitals are often held at the Town Hall. A large Museum and Art Gallery is situated over the Central Library.
